definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: In the uprising the serfs fought with bare hands against gunfire.
sentences.chinese: 在暴動中，農奴們以赤手空拳對付鋼槍鐵炮。

sentences.english: He walked out of the camp, (a ) gun in ( his) hand.
sentences.chinese: 他手握着鋼槍走出營房。

sentences.english: Will be pressed with a gun.
The soldier dashed forward, gun in hand.
sentences.chinese: 士兵手握鋼槍向前衝去。

sentences.english: Gangqiang her hand on the battlefield never ride the establishment of immortal exploits.
sentences.chinese: 她不曾手持鋼槍在戰場上馳騁，建立不朽的功勳。

sentences.english: Banks are going bust, shopkeepers keep a gun under the counter.
sentences.chinese: 銀行即將破產，商場保安手握鋼槍守着櫃檯。
